update work_group set hosnum = #{record.hosnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_group_id = #{record.workGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_group_name = #{record.workGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_code = #{record.groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_type = #{record.groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_name = #{record.departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sample_type = #{record.sampleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_number = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trace_log = #{record.traceLog,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update work_group
work_group_name = #{workGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_code = #{groupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_type = #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_type = #{sampleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trace_log = #{traceLog,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where hosnum = #{hosnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and work_group_id = #{workGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from work_group where hosnum = #{hosNum}
and (work_group_id LIKE '%' #{workGroup} '%' OR work_group_name LIKE '%' #{workGroup} '%')
select group_code from work_group where hosnum = #{hosNum} and group_type = #{groupType} limit 1
